title: When someone asks Shyvana for a good gank

replies.body:
I'd let her gank me.

https://media.giphy.com/media/V6R9thgW7fimI/giphy.gif

Well considering you're finally playing Morde now, you'll be easy to catch.
:^)
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/36/Large_bonfire.jpg

http://blacksportsonline.com/home/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/nick-young-confused-face.jpg

When does a Shyvana gank poorly? Because every Shyv I've seem has done some good ones for me

Her ganking ability is situational, she's got good damage early but either her opponent needs to be very overextended or her ally needs to be a champ who can hold them in place. It's like an Udyr gank without a stun, so Shyvana would much rather farm the jungle as she has one of the fastest clears.

And this is why shyvana's health almost always mirrors her allies.

* If teammates are doing poorly, she can't really take a support role in ganks, so she can't help so much with that. Oh, and then she gets pushed out of jungle by a fed enemy team. Fun times.
* If teammates are doing great, she never has to gank, but that's okay, 'cause her farm speed is crazy. She'll be "fed" anyway.

Shyvana's not really a comeback champion. Just a "if the enemy team was screwed, they'll stay that way" champion.

When you ask WW to gank pre-6..
Seriously what did those people think is going to happen if warwick tries ganking pre 6?
"Oh shit guys, its a Pre-6 WW, He's gunna look at me funny"
What are you talking about? He can often get a Q off before walking back into the jungle, never to be seen in that lane again, for his work there is done.
I played a game with my friend playing warwick and he literally did that, just walked into lane and gave me attack speed and looked at the other guy.

It's sad when the day comes and your favorite champion since you first start playing in season 2, gets reduced to a meme because how bad she's become.
This picture is actually really old, I remember seeing it back when i first picked her up late S3

I'm not talking about the picture, and actually this one in particular is only one of many. It's a base picture for meme captions to be applied. Similar to the board room meeting one, where there's different ones the board meeting is about and the last guy always says something that the boss tosses him out the window for.
